channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pennsylvania Dem Gov Shapiro condemns UnitedHealthcare CEO murder suspect: 'Coward, not a hero'
item.description: Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro condemned Luigi Mangione, the suspect who allegedly killed UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson in cold blood.
